Control Name: 1.7.5 VM instances which are not used are shut down.
Control Statement: Use the Start/Stop VMs during off-hours feature of virtual machines to minimize waste. There are many configuration options to schedule start the stop times. The feature is suitable as a low-cost automation option. Azure Advisor evaluates virtual machines based on CPU and network utilization over a time period and recommends actions like shut down or resize instances.
